project1.title: Example Project
project1.description: A web app for visualizing personalized Spotify data. View your top artists, top tracks, recently played tracks, and detailed audio information about each track. Create and save new playlists of recommended tracks based on your existing playlists and more.

project2.title: Portfolio Website
project2.description: A responsive portfolio website built with Next.js and TypeScript. Features include dark mode, smooth animations, and modern design principles.

project3.title: E-commerce Platform
project3.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with payment integration, inventory management, and admin dashboard.

project4.title: Task Management App
project4.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and project tracking.

footer.title: Contact
footer.description: I'm currently looking to join a cross-functional team that values improving people's lives through accessible design. or have a project in mind? Let's connect.
